topic.title: Are there real UFO leaks in ZeroNet?

2_1XLBxuYMwyLUabmYGWUyNVUDp9LoLLds4.body: BitMessage, also take a look at https://medium.com/@dealancer/bitm-an-anonymous-messenger-for-bitcoin-users-cf1213c17bde

> [pimao](#comment_4_1DB5pnToS7DKkGFa7awEZozQosZzHYb5GB): @nostak 參見http://gizmodo.com/why-you-should-stop-using-telegram-right-now-1782557415

Any device that is connected to the Internet can be hacked by someone who needs id. Ideally use offline machine/device to encrypt/decrypt messages and send it via the regular mail or other way as an image attachment in some weird format.
